references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic model framework, which is the basis for the proposed PaD-TS model and many other state-of-the-art generative models.
This paper builds upon the foundational Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models framework with improvements that enhance performance and efficiency, directly relevant to PaD-TS's development.
This paper introduces the diffusion transformer architecture, which is a core component of PaD-TS, enabling the model to efficiently handle and process sequential time-series data.
This is a seminal work in time series generation using GANs, providing a strong baseline and a point of comparison for the proposed diffusion-based model.

references.paper_title: Diffusion-TS: Interpretable Diffusion for General Time Series Generation
references.reason: This paper proposes another state-of-the-art time-series generation model using diffusion models, providing a close competitor and an important benchmark for evaluating the proposed PaD-TS model.
